example.name: other-j: Comparison-y example
example.text: A comprehensive review of systems is negative other than symptoms in the history of present illness .

example.name: other-j
example.text: The editing block looks like a miter box with two slots in it ; one is vertical across the block and the other is diagonal at a 45 degree angle .

example.name: other-j
example.text: She has also had a few nose sores , but no other complaints .
